title: What is the Wolf Pack?
content: The Wolf Pack is a collection of 1,700 Wolf NFTs â€” unique digital collectibles living on the ETH blockchain. Ownership includes creative & commercial rights of your Wolves as well as initiation into the Pack.

title: How many Wolves are reserved for giveaways?
content: We have reserved only 150 wolves that will be given away to winners of giveaways, competitions and sometimes airdropped to active owners.

title: Are Wolves minted at random?
content: Absolutely, All Wolves will be minted at random from the smart contract.

title: Do weget full commercial rights?
content: Yes, once you won a wolf, all commercial rights are then transferred to you!
